channel.title: Recruiting Programmer(s), No experience Needed
channel.description:
I'm creating a new project that is unfinished and isn't even ready for beta. I have some experience in java programming and I understand some of the coding in most source's. If you do not know how to code servers very well or at all I can teach you basics and some. If you do know how to code than you can be very helpful for this project. I'm not giving anything but knowledge so you do not have to join if you don't want to. If you would like to join it would be very helpful if you had some sort of Instant Messenger, otherwise it would be a pain to contact you and communicate. After you gain trust and enough knowledge you will receive the source, however you shouldn't be spreading it to anyone unless you are on the team. It should and probably will be enjoyable if you do join the team so I do suggest it :). Just post your email, name, experience, and the messenger you use. You don't have to join if you don't want to so I would rather not receive any replies if you're not joining, thank you.
Example: Name: Tom Email: Mister.zer0@hotmail.com Experience: I've coded a few servers and I'm somewhat knowledgable with using java and coding servers. Messenger: -MSN-, Yahoo, Aim.
Thank you for reading.
-MisterZ

item.title: Recruiting Programmer(s), No experience Needed
item.dc:creator: @MasterZer0 MasterZer0
item.description:
@MasterZer0 wrote:

OK You really helped me by telling me that even though I said above I’d rather not read a post that I do not need to read. If you don’t want to join, don’t. And your reason is simply stupid. You don’t have to have experience to join but if you do you can still join.

Read full topic

item.title: Recruiting Programmer(s), No experience Needed
item.dc:creator: @MasterZer0 MasterZer0
item.description:
@MasterZer0 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:161748”]You should at LEAST have an experience requirement.
Otherwise, you’ll have people sitting on their asses doing nothing expecting you to credit them.[/quote]
Well if that happened than I’d drop them from the team. If they don’t want to learn they can leave.

Read full topic
